module.name: Filestore
module.changelog: *16.0.10.6* FREEPBX-22759 *16.0.10.5* FREEI-3770 GQL API fix - Added condition to throw error if invalid Id is given *16.0.10.4* FREEPBX-22683 Add the functionality to implement the ssl flag in filestore ftp *16.0.10.3* Packaging of ver 16.0.10.3 *16.0.10.2* FREEI-3442 *16.0.10.1* Packaging of ver 16.0.10.1 *16.0.10* Packaging of ver 16.0.10 *16.0.9* Packaging of ver 16.0.9 *16.0.8* Packaging of ver 16.0.8 *16.0.7* FREEI-3296 *16.0.6* Packaging of ver 16.0.6 *16.0.5* Packaging of ver 16.0.5 *16.0.4* FREEI-2062 Restore to 15 from a 13/14 backup not restoring POMPS backup settings *16.0.3* Packaging of ver 16.0.3 *16.0.2* Fixing FREEI-1715 Adding FTP timeout default value *16.0.1alpha1* Initial release
